mapper.select: select t.transportgood_id, t.contractnumber, group_concat(DISTINCT products.CHINANAME) as producten, t.customer, group_concat(DISTINCT supplierbaseinfor.SUPPLIERNAMECN) as supplier, t.type, t.status, t.paymentstatus, t.paybackstatus, t.owner, group_concat(DISTINCT products.CASNUM) as casnum, t.saleresponsibility, t.productresponsibility, t.orders from transportgood t left join saledetails on saledetails.transportgood_id = t.transportgood_id left join products on products.PRODUCTS_ID =saledetails.productid left JOIN supplierbaseinfor on supplierbaseinfor.SUPPLIERBASEINFOR_ID = saledetails.supplierid GROUP BY t.transportgood_id order by t.contractnumber desc
